sentence.Network_en: The programme did much to popularize little-known writers.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个节目大力宣扬不太知名的作家。

sentence.Network_en: You must seek out the advanced experience of the masses, sum it up and popularize it.
sentence.Network_cn: 你必须发现群众的先进经验, 并加以总结和推广.

sentence.Network_en: Objective To popularize international guidelines 2005 for cardiopulmonary resuscitation in Henan Provence.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的在河南省推广2005年国际心肺复苏指南.

展开 popularity n. 出名，受大家喜爱popularize vt. 宣传， 让大家知道population n. total number of these 人口；人口数.
centralize （使）集中popularize 使普通，推广revolutionize （使）革命化

list.abs: 再说，作为约会的对象受欢迎(popular)的女孩，就是所谓的easy girl(立刻答应的女人)。对于当做结婚对象并不好，而做为约会的对象 …
形容人性格的词汇 ... polite 有礼貌的 popular 受欢迎的 practical 实际的.
九年级英语单词表 ... develop 发展 popularity 普及；流行 association 协会.
九年级英语单词表 ... develop 发展 popularity 普及；流行 association 协会.

entry.def: To popularize something means to make a lot of people interested in it and able to enjoy it.

example.ex: Irving Brokaw popularized figure skating in the US.
example.tran: 欧文·布罗考在美国引发了花样滑冰热潮。

entry.def: To popularize an academic subject or scientific idea means to make it more easy to understand  for ordinary people.

example.ex: It was Aristotle who proved the world is round. Plato popularized the concept.
example.tran: 亚里士多德证明了地球是圆的，柏拉图普及了这一概念。

means.word_mean: 1. cater to popular taste to make popular and present to the general public; bring into general or common use;

sentences.sentence: "Relativity Theory was vulgarized by these authors"

means.word_mean: 2. make understandable to the general public;

sentences.sentence: "Carl Sagan popularized cosmology in his books"

stems_affixes.word_buile: popul人民+ar…的→adj.流行的
popul人民+ous……的→adj.人口稠密的;人口多的
popul人民[平民]+ace名词字尾→n.平民,大众
popular流行的+ity性质→n.大众性,通俗性
popularize大众化,推广+ation表名词→n.普及,推广,通俗化
popularize推广+er人→n.普及者,推广者
popul人民+ation表名词→n.全体居民,人口

popular流行的+ize……化,使……→v.[使]大众化,[使]普及,推广

re一再+populate使人民重新居住于…→v.使人民重新居住于…
ad加强[有"向"之意+vert转+ize……化,做等→使转向→[做广告]使其注意……
ag一再+grand大+ize……化,做等→一再大→扩大[权力]等

ex出+orc巫术,邪魔+ize……化,做等→v.驱魔,去除[坏念头等]
fertile肥沃的+ize表动词→v.使受精;施肥于,使肥沃
general总的,大体的+ize……化,做等→v.归纳,概括,推广,普及
industrial工业的+ize……化,做等→v.[industrialise][使]工业化
jeopard危及+ize……化,做等→v.危及,危害
lion狮子+ize……化,做等→把人当狮子一样看→崇拜

memor记忆+ize……化,做等→v.记住,记忆

neutral中间的,中和的+ize……化,做等→v.使无效,中和
popular流行的+ize…化,使…→v.[使]大众化,[使]普及,推广
public公众的+ize……化,做等→v.宣传,引人注意
